body_html:
i found it's not the easy thing to solve ndk r16 issue , so i will close this pull , and new a pull req to change only the download part .

android NDK r16 killed GNU , so tensor of android platform need be prepared for llvm-clang.
it'll be a huge change in Makefile , so i think leave it to tensor developers.
